title: Coolant Renew

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.

Do not remove the expansion tank or coolant pressure cap when the engine is hot. When the engine is hot, the coolant inside the cooling system will be hot and may also be under pressure. Contact with hot coolant will cause scalds and skin damage.
From VIN AG0784 the coolant was changed from Triumph HD4X Hybrid OAT coolant to Triumph D2053 OAT coolant.
If the Triumph HD4X Hybrid OAT coolant is drained the cooling system must be flushed through prior to filling the cooling system with the Triumph D2053 OAT coolant.
Allow the engine to cool for a minimum of 30 minutes.
